review: Top-notch car and an attentive host! Also, don't forget to add FSD to your booking. It's a game changer.

name: Minyeong
review:
I was planning a 1-night, 2-day trip from Miami to Key West and was specifically looking for a Tesla with FSD. Thanks to this rental, the trip turned out absolutely amazing.

The host was very responsive and helpful, and the car was in excellent condition ‚Äî clean, well-maintained, and drove perfectly the entire trip. The long drive was incredibly comfortable, which made the whole experience even better.

I couldn't have asked for a better rental experience and would 100% recommend this car to anyone looking to rent a Tesla!

review: Excellent owner communication. Car was fantastic! Very clean, fully functioned. FSD is very impressive! Would 100% rent again.

name: Michelle
review: This was my best experience.. I come to Miami 3 times a year and I always rent a Tesla. Communication was very good. Car was very clean..Gave smooth ride. Directions were very clear on how & Where to find the car. Will definitely use you again. Thank you!

review: Pickup was a breeze, and the car was fantastic! FSD road trip is the only way to go

name: Bj√∂rn
review: Amazing experience! The car was great and FSD 14 was awesome, made the trip easy and relaxed. Super friendly host, always quick to help and insanely fast to respond.

name: Christian Gustavo
review:
I'm truly very disappointed!!!
that I can't give 10 stars to the service provided by your host, Yaineri. She was attentive from the very first minute, paying attention to every detail and answering every question I had. The Tesla is a car I would definitely rent again; it's an incredible experience. I'm never renting a car through traditional agencies again! The delivery and return process is completely streamlined.

name: Richard
review: Amazing car ! If you rent a TESLA without FSD you're missing out ! Hosts are beyond GREAT! Super responsive . Super accommodating! Will definitely be a repeat renter

review: Excellent service, the car impeccable and economical. Very attentive and friendly hostess. Thank you very much!

name: Kenneth
review: This is an awesome car! It was delivered, clean as can be, to our arrival point. It has every feature Tesla offers and all of the accessories needed for a great trip. Thanks!
